title: The F1 teams and drivers running out of time to save their 2025 season
summary: Next week, Imola will kick off the European season and a triple-header that will be key for teams and drivers who want to start easing the pressure after a difficult first part of the year

qa_pairs.question: Which event is set to kick off the European season in Formula 1?
What is the significance of the upcoming triple-header for F1 teams and drivers?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: It is key for easing pressure after a difficult first part of the year.
wrong_options: It determines grid positions for the next season.
It is a test for new car developments.

qa_pairs.question: In which year is the F1 season being discussed for potential improvement?
